page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: A quarter of the working population of Youlgrave work in the village. Employment is available in the shops, pubs, school, at the sock factory and on the farms. Just outside the village is the refractory at Friden and the limestone quarry at Hawley's Bridge. Of those people who work outside the village 40% work within 5 miles of Youlgrave whilst 20% work over 20 miles away. Most people in full-time employment do "skilled" work (58%) with a smaller number being "unskilled" (16%), "managerial" (14%) or "professional" (12%). A large number of people, mainly women, have part-time employment. Many of these do "unskilled" work, often involving cleaning or domestic help. Sarah Andrews (11) Claire Harman (11)
